meanings.sent1: The team worked on a divisional project to split the work evenly.
meanings.sent2: The divisional responsibilities were clearly outlined for each member.
meanings.sent3: The divisional tasks were like pieces of a puzzle coming together.
meanings.sent4: Her divisional approach to problem-solving helped streamline the process.
meanings.sent5: The divisional structure made it easier to manage the workload effectively.

meanings.definition: A separate section or unit within an organization or company
meanings.sent1: The marketing divisional presented their new campaign strategy.
meanings.sent2: Each divisional had its own set of goals to achieve.
meanings.sent3: The divisional meeting was filled with excitement and new ideas.
meanings.sent4: She was the head of the sales divisional, overseeing all operations.
meanings.sent5: The divisional layout of the office allowed for better collaboration among teams.
